moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores a bit of an ally’s HP.

moves.name: Mega Healing!
moves.effect: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one. If used by Mega Venusaur, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by two. (If used in a co-op battle, reduces the sync move countdown of all allied sync pairs.) Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves.

syncMove.name: Tenacious Frenzy Plant
syncMove.description: Become Mega Venusaur until the end of battle. This move’s power increases if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Potent Toxin 2
passives.description: Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Sundering 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Defense or Sp. Def—or both—when a move targeting an opponent is successful.

passives.name: Adrenaline 2
passives.description: Reduces the sync move countdown by two when a sync move is used for the first time.
